constituent: curse, mouth, elder brother, teenager, mouth, human legs, mouth2
heisigStory: For some reason, the inventor of this kanji associated a curse with the mouth of an older brother. I leave it to you to decide if he is on the giving or receiving end of the sorcery.
koohiiStory1: Caution: this means a spell, not to swear. I put a curse on my elder brother so that he can never open his mouth.
koohiiStory2: Your older brother´s mouth often curses.
kunYomi: まじな.う、のろ.い、まじな.い、のろ.う
